effects.display_string: Set: Your healing spells have a chance to apply Insurance! to their targets that heals them for 1.4 million over 15 sec. Insurance! is consumed if an ally drops below 40% health to heal them for 635,168.

Set: When your Power Word: Shield is completely absorbed on an ally, they are granted Insurance! at 40% effectiveness. Allies with your Insurance! or absorption effects receive 15% increased healing from you.

spells.description: Use: Summon a Bursting Lightspawn which sacrifices its health to unleash Bursts of Light, inflicting 710,431 Holy damage split between nearby enemies every 2 sec while it lives. (2 Min Cooldown)

Equip: Your spells have a chance to imbue the wax, causing it to form into a blazing candle for 15 sec which increases your Versatility by 3,452, further increased by 907 while you remain within its light.

transmog.display_string:
Transmogrified to:
Ashjra'kamas, Shroud of Resolve

spells.description: Equip: Your spells have a chance to call down a Voltaic Stormrook, inflicting 254,330 Nature damage split between nearby enemies and granting 2,600 Haste, further increased for each enemy struck.

T'uure, Beacon of the Naaru

spells.description: Equip: You champion the causes of your guild.  All guild reputation gains are increased by 100%.
